single_crochet in next chain 7 single_crochet increase 3 single_crochet slip_stitch f/o and leave a long tail for sewing sweet oddity art 6 assembly head and body 1 pin the head onto the body for extra support you may need to add more stuffing as you sew 2 sew the head onto the body belly 1 pin the belly onto the body and sew into place sweet oddity art 7 arms 1 pin the arm in a forward facing angle there are no particular row i place them on as it depends on how you stuff shape etc its just better to judge how you want them 2 sew the arm onto the body legs 1 turn the body upside down with the nose facing away from you 2 pin the legs onto the bottom of the body there are no special row for this just depends on the look you would like i don t place mine in between any special row i just judge based on how the individual doll looks 3 sew the legs onto the body sweet oddity art 8 tail 1 pin the tail onto the back of the body there are no particular row i place these on i try to judge how it looks after pinned 2 sew the tail onto the body ears 1 pinch the ears at the bottom and sew about 3 stitches together to give it a closed look 2 pin the ears onto the head and sew them into place there are no particular row i sew these on i try to judge them based on look sweet oddity art 9 horns 1 pin the horns onto the top of the head right near the ears 2 sew the horns into place sweet oddity art 10 spikes 1 pin the spikes onto the back of the body going down to the tail 2 sew them into place wings 1 pin the wings onto the back of the body 2 sew them into place you have your
